theorem sum_range_choose_halfway (m : nat) :

        (choose (2 * m + 1) i) :=

    calc
      2 *
            finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum"
              (range (m + 1)) (choose (2 * m + 1) i) =
          finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum"
              (range (m + 1)) (choose (2 * m + 1) i) +
            finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum"
              (range (m + 1)) (choose (2 * m + 1) (2 * m + 1 - i)) :=

          finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum"

        sum_range_add_sum_Ico _ (by linarith)

sum_range_choose:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/-- The sum of entries in a row of Pascal's triangle -/
theorem sum_range_choose (n : ℕ) :
    finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range (n + 1))
        (choose n m) =
      2 ^ n :=
  by simpa using (add_pow 1 1 n).symm
#align sum_range_choose sum_range_choose

four_pow_le_two_mul_add_one_mul_central_:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
theorem four_pow_le_two_mul_add_one_mul_central_binom (n : ℕ) : 4 ^ n ≤ (2 * n + 1) * choose (2 * n) n :=
  calc
    4 ^ n = (1 + 1) ^ (2 * n) := by norm_num [pow_mul]
    _ =
        finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum"
          (range (2 * n + 1)) (choose (2 * n) m) :=
      by simp [add_pow]
    _ ≤
        finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum"
          (range (2 * n + 1)) (choose (2 * n) (2 * n / 2)) :=
      sum_le_sum fun i hi => choose_le_middle i (2 * n)
    _ = (2 * n + 1) * choose (2 * n) n := by simp
    
#align four_pow_le_two_mul_add_one_mul_central_binom four_pow_le_two_mul_add_one_mul_central_binom
choose_middle_le_pow:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
theorem choose_middle_le_pow (n : ℕ) : choose (2 * n + 1) n ≤ 4 ^ n :=
  by
  have t :
    choose (2 * n + 1) n ≤
      finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range (n + 1))
        (choose (2 * n + 1) i) :=
    single_le_sum (fun x _ => by linarith) (self_mem_range_succ n)
  simpa [sum_range_choose_halfway n] using t
#align choose_middle_le_pow choose_middle_le_pow
alternating_sum_range_choose_of_ne:

theorem int.alternating_sum_range_choose_of_ne {n : ℕ} (h0 : n ≠ 0) :

alternating_sum_range_choose:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
theorem int.alternating_sum_range_choose {n : ℕ} :
    finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range (n + 1))
        ((-1) ^ m * ↑(choose n m) : ℤ) =
      if n = 0 then 1 else 0 :=
  by
  cases n; · simp
  have h := add_pow (-1 : ℤ) 1 n.succ
  simp only [one_pow, mul_one, add_left_neg] at h
  rw [← h, zero_pow (nat.succ_pos n), if_neg (nat.succ_ne_zero n)]
#align int.alternating_sum_range_choose int.alternating_sum_range_choose
add_pow':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/-- A version of `commute.add_pow` that avoids ℕ-subtraction by summing over the antidiagonal and
also with the binomial coefficient applied via scalar action of ℕ. -/
theorem add_pow' :
    (x + y) ^ n =
      finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum"
        (nat.antidiagonal n) («expr • » (choose n m.fst) (x ^ m.fst * y ^ m.snd)) :=
  by
  simp_rw [finset.nat.sum_antidiagonal_eq_sum_range_succ fun m p => «expr • » (choose n m) (x ^ m * y ^ p),
    _root_.nsmul_eq_mul, cast_comm, h.add_pow]
#align add_pow' add_pow'
add_pow:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum -/
/-- The **binomial theorem** -/
theorem add_pow [CommSemiring R] (x y : R) (n : ℕ) :
    (x + y) ^ n =
      finset.sum "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum" (range (n + 1))
        (x ^ m * y ^ (n - m) * choose n m) :=
  (Commute.all x y).add_pow n
#align add_pow add_pow
